message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $7,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $6,500 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $6,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $6,900.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to make a counteroffer of $6,700 for the product.
I understand you're getting close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make a slight adjustment and offer the product to you for $6,800.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counteroffer at $6,750 for the product.
I'm getting close to my target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and offer the product to you for $6,850.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $6,800 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $6,900, but no lower. This is my final offer.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to make a final counteroffer of $6,875 for the product.
